title: Britain's European rejection and an intimate view of archaeology
itunes:title: Britain's European rejection and an intimate view of archaeology
itunes:subtitle: With Britain's membership of the EU in the news again, we examine the moment 50 years ago, when Charles de Gaulle vetoed Harold Macmillan's request to join the EEC. Plus, we chat with Richard Morris about his new, rather personal, book on Bri...
description:
With Britain's membership of the EU in the news again, we examine the moment 50 years ago, when Charles de Gaulle vetoed Harold Macmillan's request to join the EEC. Plus, we chat with Richard Morris about his new, rather personal, book on Britain's archaeological past

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
